Namely | NYC | On-site | Fulltime

My team here is focused on building an API driven architecture, powered by high-performance, open-source frameworks to revolutionize HR software.

Our strategy to deliver the most powerful, technologically advanced HR software rests on building large scale distributed systems, streaming data architectures, defining/implementing robust internal and public APIs and much more.

Platform tech: Go, React, gRPC, Kubernetes, Airflow, Docker, Spark, Kafka and more.

We're hiring for several roles within Engineering: - Principal Engineer - Staff Engineer - Senior Engineer (Backend/Frontend/Fullstack) - Data Engineer - SRE - Security Engineer

Apply here: https://www.namely.com/careers/ or email at recruiting@namely.com

Thanks!
